name: hongling-ui-api
description: PostgreSQL Repository Layer for Hongling UI - 虹靈御所資料存取層

scripts.init-db: node -e "const repo = require('./repository/PostgresRepo'); const config = require('./config'); (async () => { const r = new repo(config); await r.connect(); console.log('Database initialized'); await r.disconnect(); })();"
